sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'advice-generator'; advice!:string; constructor(private http:HttpClient){} ngOnInit(){ this.http.get ('https://api.serviceslip.com/advice').subscribe(data => { this.advice = data.slip.advice; }); } } Frontend Mentor | Advice generator app
ADVICE #
"{{ advice }}"
